vernac_cmds: Definition prep (x : string bool) (t : term) : term := fold_right t_f t x.
Definition iprep domain eta {I : interp domain eta} (x : list bool) (y : domain) := fold_right i_f y x.
Definition F1 := map (fun '(x,y) => Pr (enc x) (enc y)) R.
Definition F2 := map (fun '(x, y) => ∀ u; ∀ v; Pr u v --> Pr (prep x u) (prep y v)) R.
Definition F3 := (∀ u; Pr u u --> Q).
Definition F : form b := F1 ==> F2 ==> F3 --> Q.
Lemma prep_subst y t1 x t : subst_t y t1 (prep x t) = prep x (subst_t y t1 t).
Lemma prep_vars x t : vars_t (prep x t) = vars_t t.
Lemma iprep_eval domain eta (I : interp domain eta) rho x s : eval rho (prep x s) = iprep x (eval rho s).
induction x; cbn; now do 2 f_equal.
Lemma iprep_app domain eta (I : interp domain eta) x y d : iprep (x ++ y) d = iprep x (iprep y d).
Global Instance IB : interp (string bool) (fun _ => []) := {| i_f b s := b :: s ; i_e := nil; i_P u v := derivable R u v ; i_Q := BPCP' R |}.
Lemma IB_prep rho s t : eval rho (prep s t) = s ++ eval rho t.
Lemma IB_enc rho s : eval rho (enc s) = s.
Lemma IB_drv rho t1 t2 : rho ⊨ (Pr t1 t2) <-> derivable R (eval rho t1) (eval rho t2).
Lemma IB_F rho : rho ⊨ F -> BPCP' R.
Lemma drv_val domain eta (I : interp domain eta) rho u v : derivable R u v -> rho ⊨ (F1 ==> F2 ==> Pr (enc u) (enc v)).
eapply (H1 (∀ 0; ∀ 1; Pr 0 1 --> Pr (prep x 0) (prep y 1))) in IHderivable.
Theorem BPCP_valid : BPCP R <-> valid F.
intros [u H] D eta I rho.
apply IB_F with (rho := fun _ => nil), H.
Definition ctx_S := F3 :: rev F2 ++ rev F1.
Lemma drv_prv s u v : derivable R u v -> (@prv s b ctx_S (Pr (enc u) (enc v))).
assert (@prv s b ctx_S (∀ 0; ∀ 1; Pr 0 1 --> Pr (prep x 0) (prep y 1))).
eapply AllE with (t := enc u) in H1; eauto.
eapply AllE with (t := enc v) in H1; eauto.
Lemma impl_prv s A B phi : @prv s b (rev B ++ A) phi -> @ prv s b A (B ==> phi).
revert A; induction B; intros A; cbn; simpl_list; intros.
Lemma BPCP_prv' s : BPCP' R -> @prv s b nil F.
assert (@prv s b ctx_S (∀ 0; Pr 0 0 --> Q)).
eapply AllE with (t := enc u) in H0.
Theorem BPCP_prv R : BPCP R <-> nil ⊢M (F R).
Lemma valid_satis phi : valid phi -> ~ satis (¬ phi).
intros H1 (D & eta & I & rho & H2).
apply H2, (H1 D eta I rho).
Theorem BPCP_satis R : ~ BPCP R <-> satis (¬ F R).
Corollary prv_red : BPCP ⪯ @prv intu frag nil.
Corollary prv_undec : UA -> ~ decidable (@prv intu frag nil).
Corollary prv_unenum : UA -> ~ enumerable (compl (@prv intu frag nil)).

Instance IB : interp (option (string bool)) (fun _ => Some nil) := {| i_f b x := match x with Some u => Some (b :: u) | None => None end ; i_e := Some nil; i_P x y := match x, y with Some u, Some v => derivable R u v | _, _ => True end ; i_Q := False |}.
Lemma IB_eval_Some rho t u v : eval rho t = Some v -> eval rho (prep u t) = Some (u ++ v).
Lemma IB_eval_None rho t u : eval rho t = None -> eval rho (prep u t) = None.
Lemma IB_enc rho u : eval rho (enc u) = Some u.
Lemma IB_deriv rho u v : rho ⊨ (Pr (enc u) (enc v)) <-> derivable R u v.
Lemma IB_deriv' rho t1 t2 u v : eval rho t1 = Some u -> eval rho t2 = Some v -> rho ⊨ (Pr t1 t2) <-> derivable R u v.
Lemma IB_F1 rho : rho ⊫ F1 R.
Lemma IB_F2 rho : rho ⊫ F2 R.
Lemma IB_F rho : rho ⊨ F R.

command: induction x; cbn; now do 2 f_equal.
eapply (H1 (∀ 0; ∀ 1; Pr 0 1 --> Pr (prep x 0) (prep y 1))) in IHderivable.
assert (@prv s b ctx_S (∀ 0; ∀ 1; Pr 0 1 --> Pr (prep x 0) (prep y 1))).
eapply AllE with (t := enc u) in H1; eauto.
eapply AllE with (t := enc v) in H1; eauto.
revert A; induction B; intros A; cbn; simpl_list; intros.
assert (@prv s b ctx_S (∀ 0; Pr 0 0 --> Q)).
eapply AllE with (t := enc u) in H0.
intros H1 (D & eta & I & rho & H2).
apply H2, (H1 D eta I rho).
